title: orderItem
description: An item on an order. The details of the order item are specified in the productSpecOrderDetails.

objectType.description: The type of the object, orderItem.

orderItemReference.description: A reference number that can be used to refer to this order item.

action.description: The action to be taken for this order item (E.g. Install, Change).

quantity.description: The quantity for the order item.

orderItemDetail.description: The ordering representation of the product specification being ordered with this order item.
